title: Shipwreck Profile
description: Defines a shipwreck including the original ship, cause of sinking, location, cargo, survivors, legends, and current salvage status.

original_ship_id.description: Reference to the original ship profile if one exists

cargo.description: What the ship was carrying when it sank

legends.description: Stories, ghost tales, and legends about the wreck

fame_reason.description: Why this wreck is famous -- ship's prior reputation, famous captain/crew, cargo, cause of demise, creature now inhabiting it, or combination (limit to 2 reasons)

ship_prior_fame.description: Was the ship famous before sinking? Special engine, experimental weapons, fearsome appearance, famous missions

current_creature_inhabitant.description: Any creature now inhabiting the wreck -- can it pilot the vessel? Is it the source of the wreck's infamy?

crew_fate.description: What happened to the crew -- all dead, captured, marooned, some survived with new lives

current_hazards.description: Monsters, currents, curses, structural collapse, radiation, supernatural residue

x-cross-references.ship-profile: The original ship before it sank
x-cross-references.place-of-interest-profile: A shipwreck is a place of interest
